translation: Salutations to You in front and behind! Salutations to You on every side! O All! You, infinite in power and prowess, pervade all; therefore You are all.
commentary: 11.40 Namah salutation? Purastat (from) front? And also? behind (from) behind? And to Thee? Namah salutation? Let's be? And to Thee? Everywhere on every side? Eve even? All O all? Infinite semen infinite power? Amitvikrama: infinite in prowess? You Thou? Everything all? Do you finish pervadest? Then wherefore? Asi (Thou) art? all all.Commentary The words I prostrate myself before Thee? behind Thee and on every side
